biotools.summary: This tutorial aims to illustrate the process of setting up a simulation system containing a protein, step by step, using the BioExcel Building Blocks (biobb) REST API. The particular example used is the Lysozyme protein (PDB code 1AKI).

bioschemas.name: BioExcel Building Blocks tutorials: Protein MD Setup tutorial through REST API
bioschemas.summary: This tutorial aims to illustrate the process of setting up a simulation system containing a protein, step by step, using the BioExcel Building Blocks (biobb) REST API. The particular example used is the Lysozyme protein (PDB code 1AKI).
